name: Make It Reign
description:
Make it rain whatever image you want.  Select an image from your device, and engross yourself in streams of your image.  I made this app with the Godot game engine.  Enjoy the reign!

For Android, permission to access the local file system must be granted in the Android settings for Make It Reign.

Currently, navigating folders from the downloads folder is broken on Android due to a Godot engine bug.
